Body: DAVESTAR POWERWASHING is a trusted and reliable power washing company that takes pride in providing excellent customer service. Our primary service is power washing, but we also offer house washing, gutter cleaning, driveway cleaning, walkway cleaning, deck cleaning, and commercial building cleaning. Our commitment to our customers is 100% satisfaction, and we believe that the job isn't done until you say it's done. We have also been recognized for our exceptional services, receiving the Super Service Award in 2014 and making the Honor Roll in 2016 from Angie's List.
AltText: DAVESTAR POWERWASHING team power washing a house in Methuen, MA
